description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/retrieve-tag-details/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/retrieve-tag-details/)

Returns details for given tag key related to an issue.

### Path Parameters

`issue_id` *(string)*REQUIRED

The ID of the issue to retrieve.

`key` *(string)*REQUIRED

The tag key to look the values up for.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `event:read`
